zqog43p1.label: Unrestricted
zqog43p1.rules:
##Description
Beat the game as fast as possible.

##Video Threshold
Video proof is not required for runs outside of top 30.

013jgmdl.label: No Major Glitches
013jgmdl.rules:
##Description
Beat the game without using certain restricted glitches. This is defined as follows:
 
Any glitch that allows Samus to move entirely into collision is disallowed. You can easily check what is considered an OoB collision by seeing if it's possible for Samus to die in it.

This includes the following glitches:
* Shine Sink
* Camera Lock
* Slope Clip
* Ledge Climb Clip
* Reverse Magnet
* Grappling magnets through walls

Instances of collision updating, failing to update, or respawning do not invalidate a glitch. It is possible to die with Pseudo-Waves and Ledge Warps this way, but they do not allow you to directly clip out of bounds.

In addition, any glitch that results in Samus's rotation suffering a lasting displacement is disallowed. This includes:

* Axis Skew
* Upside-Down Samus

If you are unsure if a glitch is allowed, consult the Discord server.

##Video Threshold
Video proof is not required for runs outside of top 30.

klr8wp21.label: Glitchless
klr8wp21.rules:
##Description
Beat the game without using any glitches.

**Banned Techniques**

* Shine Sink Clip
* Slope Clip
* Reverse Magnet
* Ledge Warp
* Camera Lock
* Invincibility
* Axis Skew
* Upside-Down Samus
* Pseudo Wave
* Reverse Grapple
* Water Bomb Jump

0q5mrgrl.label: Unrestricted
0q5mrgrl.rules:
##Description
* Beat the game while collecting every expansion in the game.  
* At the end of the run, you should have 275 Missiles, 12 Energy Tanks, and 15 Power Bombs.  
* Major Upgrades do not count for percent, so they aren't strictly required for 100%.

##Video Threshold
Video proof is not required for runs outside of top 15.

rqv58z51.label: No Turbo
rqv58z51.rules:
##Description
Complete Boss Rush as fast as possible.
 
##Timing
Boss Rush categories are timed with IGT.
 
##Submission Rules

When submitting, please list the following: 
 
* IGT  
* Copy of the game (Physical/Digital)  
* Version number (Found by pressing + on the game from the Switch menu)

##Video Proof

Video proof is required for runs faster than 8:00. All videos must include the following:  
 
* Game Audio for the entire run  
* IGT at the end of the run  
* Visible HUD so your Energy Tank, Missile, and Power Bomb counts can be verified
 
Runs above the threshold only need to provide proof of IGT. Upload a screenshot of your IGT to Imgur and paste the URL in the run comment.
 
##Other Rules
* Emulators are not allowed  
* Use of Amiibos is banned  
* Turbo controllers are not allowed  
* Rebinding controls with the Switch menu is allowed  
* 3rd Party Controllers are allowed

5le7jvp1.label: Turbo
5le7jvp1.rules:
##Description
Complete Boss Rush as fast as possible.
 
##Timing
Boss Rush categories are timed with IGT.
 
##Submission Rules

When submitting, please list the following: 
 
* IGT  
* Copy of the game (Physical/Digital)  
* Version number (Found by pressing + on the game from the Switch menu)

##Video Proof

Video proof is required for runs faster than 8:00. All videos must include the following:  
 
* Game Audio for the entire run  
* IGT at the end of the run  
* Visible HUD so your Energy Tank, Missile, and Power Bomb counts can be verified
 
Runs above the threshold only need to provide proof of IGT. Upload a screenshot of your IGT to Imgur and paste the URL in the run comment.
 
##Other Rules
* Emulators are not allowed  
* Use of Amiibos is banned  
* Turbo controllers up to 20hz are allowed  
* Rebinding controls with the Switch menu is allowed  
* 3rd Party Controllers are allowed
